name: In Thought
description:
This game is not exciting or fun. But, it gives you some different and unique experiences.

I was inspired by so many games that give me some strange feelings. Those are mixed with my faith and values and then created an inexplicable feeling. Finally, I thought I had to express it through the way that I can do the best. It was a game. And I have done making this. Hope you enjoy it and hope that you can come up with some feelings while playing it.
